data.event: He acquired it in 1715, after which the house Berkeloord was renamed to De Tempel.

event.title: the introduction of the municipal system by the French in 1812

data.event: After the introduction of the municipal system by the French in 1812, the area belonged to the municipality of Pijnacker, even though it was completely surrounded by the territory of Berkel en Rodenrijs.
In 1817, the manorial rights were restored, and Tempel became a separate municipality, although it was very small (only 0.109 kmÂ²) and had no inhabitants.
In 1855, the municipality became part of Berkel en Rodenrijs.
